projects.title: E-commerce Backend
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with comprehensive features for modern online shopping.
highlights: Secure user authentication and authorization system
Integrated Stripe payment processing with order tracking
Real-time inventory management with automated alerts
RESTful API design with comprehensive documentation

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.
highlights: Real-time updates using Socket.io for instant collaboration
Drag-and-drop functionality for intuitive task organization
Analytics dashboard with project progress tracking

projects.title: Movie Revenue Prediction
projects.description: Machine learning project that forecasts movie box office earnings using advanced analytics.
highlights: Predictive modeling using Random Forest and XGBoost algorithms
Sentiment analysis from reviews and social media trends
Comprehensive data pipeline following CRISP-DM methodology
Interactive dashboard for exploring prediction insights

projects.title: GatorCan
projects.description: Full-stack educational platform for seamless course management and collaboration.
highlights: Course management system with assignment submissions
Real-time collaboration tools for students and instructors
Scalable architecture built with Golang and React.js
Cloud deployment with AWS for high availability
